A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: HUGE Star Wars fan.....but this movie was TERRIBLE!  Worst scene ever in a Star Wars movie was in this when Princess Lea comes back into the ship.  I couldn't believe it!  So many plot holes\, predictable\, no character development\, not consistent with the Jedi\, Luke looked like a coward...I still can't believe how bad it was.
